column3: Create an Update Request for a journal that does not have a current Update Request.  Make a change that will be fairly easy to review from the ToC (e.g. the APC amount).  Take a note of the Journal's ToC URL
Locate the Update Request created in the previous step from the admin area search

Create another Update Request for the same journal.  Make a change that will be fairly easy to review from the ToC (e.g. the APC amount) AND which is different from the change made before.  Take a note of the Journal's ToC URL
Locate the new Update Request created in the previous step in the admin search area

column4: The Journal page has been updated with the new information from the Update Request (e.g the updated APC amount)

column3: Search for the Journal's ISSN in the admin journal search

column4: There is only one Journal published in DOAJ with that ISSN

column3: Find the accepted application via the admin search (e.g. filter by Accepted and sort by last updated most recent first)
